thread.section_title: Interflora arvostelut | Asiakkaiden arvostelut Interflora | www.interflora.fi | 2/244
thread.title: Yohanna Hempton

author: Yohanna Hempton
title: Yohanna Hempton
text:
The online customer service rep Minttu provided outstanding service. She helped me with delivery options, contacted me immediately to advise that the florist was unable to provide me with my 1st choice of candies but could exchange them for chocolates at the same price. She conversed in perfect English, my Finnish is poor, so it was greatly appreciated. She was also very friendly.
Would definitely recommend.
